mapper.select: SELECT ci.idt_name FROM cl_member cm LEFT JOIN cl_member_identity cmi on cm.mem_idx = cmi.mem_idx LEFT JOIN cl_identity ci ON cmi.idt_code = ci.idt_code WHERE cm.mem_id = #{mem_id} AND cmi.delete_yn = "N" and ci.delete_yn = "N"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cl_member_identity (idt_code, mem_idx) VALUES (#{idt_code}, (select cm.mem_idx from cl_member cm where cm.mem_id = #{mem_id}))
